annotations.context: Three methods for genetically modifying breast organoids are discussed: Lipofectamine 2000 (Step 65A), electroporation (Step 65B), and lentiviral transduction (Step 65C). Electroporation is used for Fig. S4 of ref. 7.
annotations.method: Lipofectamine 2000 for transient transfection with moderate-to-high efficiency (Step 65A)
